content: Okay. I'm going to approve this one. Nice puzzle.
I edited a bit the statement (added the 4-letter sided square).

There's an error in the "This a mix!" validator. There's an extra space character at the end of the 6th line of input, right after "Hide__".

Typo's aside, I'm a bit conflicted on this puzzle because of the advertisements / personal agendas / disturbing messages in the input. For example:

 - NUM83R5 (in More loops input) - I assume this is a plug for the obscure band??

 - BEER>WATER (in Let's try everything output) - Potentially controversial.

 - If_S¤mebody_find_This_s3Cret_Code,_I_W1Ll_Kill_You.Trust_Me (in This a mix! input) - Just disturbing, even as a joke.

I'm not comfortable approving this puzzle with such (barely) hidden messages in it.

It's okay, I'll change the messages ;)
But what is your "obscure band" NUM83R5 ?

[quote]
BEER>WATER (in Let's try everything output) - Potentially controversial. 
[/quote]

Hrm, we are geeks, aren’t we? ;-)

But what is your "obscure band" NUM83R5 ?

I just googled "NUM83R5", and most of the top links that come up are related to a band that I've never heard of. For example:

https://www.facebook.com/w34r3num83r5/

Obviously, I was off-base on this one. :-)
